AJT.name: ADJUSTMENT DETAILS
AJT.function: To identify the reason for an adjustment.

ALC.name: ALLOWANCE OR CHARGE
ALC.function: To identify allowance or charge details.

ALI.name: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
ALI.function: To indicate that special conditions due to the origin, customs preference, fiscal or commercial factors are applicable.

APR.name: ADDITIONAL PRICE INFORMATION
APR.function: To provide information concerning pricing related to class of trade, price multiplier, and reason for change.

ARD.name: AMOUNTS RELATIONSHIP DETAILS
ARD.function: To provide details of the function of a monetary amount.

ARR.name: ARRAY INFORMATION
ARR.function: To contain the data in a array.

ASI.name: ARRAY STRUCTURE IDENTIFICATION
ASI.function: To identify the structure of an array.

AUT.name: AUTHENTICATION RESULT
AUT.function: To specify results of the application of an authentification procedure.

BGM.name: BEGINNING OF MESSAGE
BGM.function: To indicate the type and function of a message and to transmit the identifying number.

BII.name: STRUCTURE IDENTIFICATION
BII.function: A segment used to convey an indexing structure mechanism which identifies the positioning of a group or item.

BUS.name: BUSINESS FUNCTION
BUS.function: To provide information related to the processing and purpose of a financial message.

CAV.name: CHARACTERISTIC VALUE
CAV.function: To provide the value of a characteristic.

CCD.name: CREDIT COVER DETAILS
CCD.function: To request a credit cover, reply to that request and disclose the reason for the reply.

CCI.name: CHARACTERISTIC/CLASS ID
CCI.function: To identify and describe a specific characteristic.

CDI.name: PHYSICAL OR LOGICAL STATE
CDI.function: To describe a physical or logical state.

CDS.name: CODE SET IDENTIFICATION
CDS.function: To identify a code set and to give its class and maintenance operation.

CDV.name: CODE VALUE DEFINITION
CDV.function: To provide information related to a code value.

CED.name: COMPUTER ENVIRONMENT DETAILS
CED.function: To give a precise definition of all necessary elements belonging to the configuration of a computer system like hardware, firmware, operating system, communication (VANS, network type, protocol, format) and application software.

CMP.name: COMPOSITE DATA ELEMENT IDENTIFICATION
CMP.function: To identify a composite data element and to give its class and maintenance operation.

COD.name: COMPONENT DETAILS
COD.function: To provide component details of an object (e.g. product, container) such as its type and the material of which it is composed.

COM.name: COMMUNICATION CONTACT
COM.function: To identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

COT.name: CONTRIBUTION DETAILS
COT.function: To specify details about membership contributions.

sub_elements.name: Transport charges method of payment, coded

CPS.name: CONSIGNMENT PACKING SEQUENCE
CPS.function: To identify the sequence in which physical packing is presented in the consignment, and optionally to identify the hierarchical relationship between packing layers.

CST.name: CUSTOMS STATUS OF GOODS
CST.function: To specify goods in terms of customs identities, status and intended use.

CTA.name: CONTACT INFORMATION
CTA.function: To identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

CUX.name: CURRENCIES
CUX.function: To specify currencies used in the transaction and relevant details for the rate of exchange.

DAM.name: DAMAGE
DAM.function: To specify damage including action taken.

fields.name: CATEGORY OF MEANS OF TRANSPORT, CODED

DII.name: DIRECTORY IDENTIFICATION
DII.function: To identify a directory and to give its release, status, controlling agency, language and maintenance operation.

DLI.name: DOCUMENT LINE IDENTIFICATION
DLI.function: To specify the processing mode of a specific line within a referenced document.

DMS.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE SUMMARY
DMS.function: To specify summary information relating to the document/message.

DOC.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE DETAILS
DOC.function: To identify documents, either printed, electronically transferred, or referenced as specified in message description, including, where relevant, the identification of the type of transaction that will result from this message.

fields.name: NUMBER OF COPIES OF DOCUMENT REQUIRED
NUMBER OF ORIGINALS OF DOCUMENT REQUIRED

DTM.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
DTM.function: To specify date, and/or time, or period.

EFI.name: EXTERNAL FILE LINK IDENTIFICATION
EFI.function: To specify the link of one non-EDIFACT external file to an EDIFACT message.

ELM.name: SIMPLE DATA ELEMENT DETAILS
ELM.function: To identify a simple data element and give related details.

fields.name: SIMPLE DATA ELEMENT LENGTH TYPE, CODED

ELU.name: DATA ELEMENT USAGE DETAILS
ELU.function: To specify the usage of a data element.

EQA.name: ATTACHED EQUIPMENT
EQA.function: To specify attached or related equipment.

EQD.name: EQUIPMENT DETAILS
EQD.function: To identify a unit of equipment.

EQN.name: NUMBER OF UNITS
EQN.function: To specify the number of units.

ERC.name: APPLICATION ERROR INFORMATION
ERC.function: To identify the type of application error within a message.

ERP.name: ERROR POINT DETAILS
ERP.function: To identify the location and type of application error within a message.

FII.name: FINANCIAL INSTITUTION INFORMATION
FII.function: To identify an account and a related financial institution.

FNS.name: FOOTNOTE SET
FNS.function: To identify a set of footnotes.

FTX.name: FREE TEXT
FTX.function: To provide free form or coded text information.

GDS.name: NATURE OF CARGO
GDS.function: To indicate the type of cargo as a general classification.

GID.name: GOODS ITEM DETAILS
GID.function: To indicate totals of a goods item.

GIN.name: GOODS IDENTITY NUMBER
GIN.function: To give specific identification numbers, either as single numbers or ranges.

GIR.name: RELATED IDENTIFICATION NUMBERS
GIR.function: To specify a related set of identification numbers.

GOR.name: GOVERNMENTAL REQUIREMENTS
GOR.function: To indicate the requirement for a specific govermental action and/or procedure or which specific procedure is valid for a specific part of the transport.

GRU.name: SEGMENT GROUP USAGE DETAILS
GRU.function: To specify the usage of a segment group within a message type structure and its maintenance operation.

HAN.name: HANDLING INSTRUCTIONS
HAN.function: To specify handling and where necessary, notify hazards.

IHC.name: PERSON CHARACTERISTIC
IHC.function: To specify characteristics of a person such as ethnic origin.

IMD.name: ITEM DESCRIPTION
IMD.function: To describe an item in either an industry or free format.

INP.name: PARTIES TO INSTRUCTION
INP.function: To specify parties to an instruction and where relevant, the instruction.

INV.name: INVENTORY MANAGEMENT RELATED DETAILS
INV.function: To provide the different information related to the inventory management functions and needed to process properly the inventory movements and the inventory balances.

IRQ.name: INFORMATION REQUIRED
IRQ.function: To indicate which information is requested in a responding message.

LIN.name: LINE ITEM
LIN.function: To identify a line item and configuration.

LOC.name: PLACE/LOCATION IDENTIFICATION
LOC.function: To identify a country/place/location/related location one/related location two.

MEA.name: MEASUREMENTS
MEA.function: To specify physical measurements, including dimension tolerances, weights and counts.

MKS.name: MARKET/SALES CHANNEL INFORMATION
MKS.function: To specify to which market and/or through which sales distribution channel and/or for which end-use the sales of product/service have been made or are given as forecast.

MSG.name: MESSAGE TYPE IDENTIFICATION
MSG.function: To identify a message type and to give its class and maintenance operation.

NAD.name: NAME AND ADDRESS
NAD.function: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by CO82 only and/or unstructured by CO58 or structured by CO80 thru 3207.

PAC.name: PACKAGE
PAC.function: To describe the number and type of packages/physical units.

PAI.name: PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS
PAI.function: To specify the instructions for payment.

PAT.name: PAYMENT TERMS BASIS
PAT.function: To specify the payment terms basis.

PCI.name: PACKAGE IDENTIFICATION
PCI.function: To specify markings and labels on individual packages or physical units.

PDI.name: PERSON DEMOGRAPHIC INFORMATION
PDI.function: To specify items of person demographic information.

PGI.name: PRODUCT GROUP INFORMATION
PGI.function: To indicate the group in which a product belongs.

PIA.name: ADDITIONAL PRODUCT ID
PIA.function: To specify additional or substitutional item identification codes.

PIT.name: PRICE ITEM LINE
PIT.function: To specify details relating to pricing of a product.

PNA.name: PARTY NAME
PNA.function: To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a party.

PSD.name: PHYSICAL SAMPLE DESCRIPTION
PSD.function: To define the physical sample parameters associated with a test, resulting in discrete measurements.

PTY.name: PRIORITY
PTY.function: The segment is used to communicate priority information.

QVR.name: QUANTITY VARIANCES
QVR.function: To specify item details relating to quantity variances.

RCS.name: REQUIREMENTS AND CONDITIONS
RCS.function: To specify sector/subject requirements and conditions.

REL.name: RELATIONSHIP
REL.function: To identify the direct relationship between the data/information contained in one segment and the data/information contained in one or more other segments.

SCD.name: STRUCTURE COMPONENT DEFINITION
SCD.function: To specify a component of a data structure (e.g. an array or table).

SEG.name: SEGMENT IDENTIFICATION
SEG.function: To identify a segment and give its class and maintenance operation.

SEL.name: SEAL NUMBER
SEL.function: To specify a seal number related to equipment.

SEQ.name: SEQUENCE DETAILS
SEQ.function: To provide specific details related to the delivery sequence.

SGP.name: SPLIT GOODS PLACEMENT
SGP.function: To specify the placement of goods in relation to equipment.

SGU.name: SEGMENT USAGE DETAILS
SGU.function: To specify the details of the usage of a segment within a message type structure.

SPS.name: SAMPLING PARAMETERS FOR SUMMARY STATISTICS
SPS.function: To define the sampling parameters associated with summary statistics reported.

STA.name: STATISTICS
STA.function: To transmit summary statistics related to a specified collection of test result values.

STG.name: STAGES
STG.function: To provide information related to the kind of stage in a process, the number of stages and the actual stage.

STS.name: STATUS
STS.function: To specify the type of industry sector/application to which this segment refers, giving the status and status reason relevant to conducting business and/or services.

TDT.name: DETAILS OF TRANSPORT
TDT.function: To specify the transport details such as mode of transport, means of transport, its conveyance reference number and the identification of the means of transport. The segment may be pointed to by the TPL segment.

sub_elements.name: Type of means of transport identification
Id. of means of transport identification
Id. of the means of transport
Nationality of means of transport, coded

TEM.name: TEST METHOD
TEM.function: To describe the nature of the test performed.

TMD.name: TRANSPORT MOVEMENT DETAILS
TMD.function: To specify operational transport movement details for a goods item or equipment (which may differ from the contractual conditions).

TOD.name: TERMS OF DELIVERY OR TRANSPORT
TOD.function: To specify terms of delivery or transport.

fields.name: TERMS OF DELIVERY OR TRANSPORT FUNCTION, CODED
TRANSPORT CHARGES METHOD OF PAYMENT, CODED

sub_elements.name: Terms of delivery or transport, coded

TPL.name: TRANSPORT PLACEMENT
TPL.function: To specify placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used. The segment serves as a pointer to the TDT segment group.

sub_elements.name: Id. of means of transport identification
Id. of the means of transport
Nationality of means of transport, coded

TSR.name: TRANSPORT SERVICE REQUIREMENTS
TSR.function: To specify the contract and carriage conditions and service and priority requirements for the transport.

VLI.name: VALUE LIST IDENTIFICATION
VLI.function: To identify a coded or non coded value list.
